H0.text: What was said to have been guarded by the Fisher King. Holy Scepter

H1.text: What was said to have been guarded by the Fisher King. Sacred Chalice

H2.text: What was said to have been guarded by the Fisher King. Magical Amulet

H3.text: What was said to have been guarded by the Fisher King. Grail

A4.text: The Fisher King (French: Roi PÃªcheur; Welsh: Brenin Pysgotwir; Cornish: Pyscador Myghtern; Breton: Roue ar Peskataer) is a figure in Arthurian legend, the last in a long line of British kings tasked with guarding the Holy Grail.

A5.text: Most versions of the story contain the Holy Grail and the Lance of Longinus as plot elements.
